text.en: With the blessings of Tsogyal, wisdom ḍākinī of great bliss,
Emanation of the lady of Shelkar,1
text.en-trans: jinlap shelkar za yi nampar trul

text.en: Āyu Dharma Dīpam, ‘Long Life, Lamp of the Dharma’, to you I pray.
Grant your blessing so that all our wishes in accordance with the Dharma be fulfilled.
text.en-trans: samdön chö zhin drubpar jin gyi lop
